title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, the DispatcherType is incorrect after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch()
OB: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC.
EB: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the expected behavior is that the DispatcherType should be ASYNC, not REQUEST. It should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Define a ServletRequestListener.
2. Call AsyncContext.dispatch() in your servlet code.
3. Observe that the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC, which is the incorrect behavior.
